name: Broken Baubles
description:
Broken Baubles is a kinetic novel that follows the everyday life of Merry, a young woman who finds a gachapon on Christmas Eve. Instead of a capsule, a brightly colored ornament pops out of the machine. 

Follow her sudden adventure in a new world as everything she knows disappears from her life, thrust into a wintry wonderland. 

Can you help her get home?

Note: This build only has one route, so please choose 'PURPLE' for the color of the ornament. 

-------------------------------------
